hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Piece of the Triforce# and #a Ganon's Castle Small Key#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Red Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree Compass Room Side Chest

GC (Maze).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Recovery Heart#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the way of the hero.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Magic Meter#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that an #invisible spinning blade# in the Shadow Temple guards...^ #the Shadow Temple Boss Key# and #a Piece of the Triforce#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Visible Chest
Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Invisible Chest

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #a Piece of the Triforce# and #a Piece of the Triforce#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a #Big Skulltula# guarding a Gold one.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##the Thieves' Hideout## has #0# major items.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Hylian Shield#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path of #gold#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Hylian Shield#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: What do you call a group of Gorons?^${12 39 C7}A rock band.
